snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, delivering his State of the State address along with a budget proposal heavy on infrastructure, said New York State must take the lead in solving national problems.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's State of the State address outlines goals for his second term including education reform, raising minimum wage and improving relations between communities and police; proposes budget of $150 billion, 4.9 percent higher than the current fiscal year.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and JESSE McKINLEY
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Thomas Kaplan and Kate Taylor from Albany, and Al Baker, Mireya Navarro and Kirk Semple from New York.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, delivering his State of the State address along with a budget proposal heavy on infrastructure, said New York State must take the lead in solving national problems.

headline.main: Cuomo Recasts Social Agenda for a New Term
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Recasts Social Agenda for a New Term
